name: Sci-Adventure Educational game (sample)
description:
Sci-Adventure is an educational game where players can beat levels by using scientific facts. 

the game consists of 3 levels:

1- level one shows the player his goal which is to find the book.

2- level two is oriented around a scientific fact which is that metals are good electric conductors so to get to the book and beat the level you have to use the metal not the wood to connect the wire of the platform to lift you up.

  3- level 3 illustrates that salt is soluble but metal isn't so to press the button in the water you should throw the metal to press it then jump over the platform to continue.

to sum up, this game is intended to help students make use of scientific facts they learn from school in a fun interactive way through the game and that is the future of high-quality education.
